mapper.select: select a.id, a.receipt_order_id, a.sku_id, a.quantity, a.amount, a.expiration_time, a.remark, a.warehouse_id, a.area_id, a.create_time, a.create_by, a.update_time, a.update_by, b.sku_name, b.out_sku_id, c.item_name, c.item_no, c.item_brand from wms_receipt_order_detail a left join wms_item_sku b on a.sku_id=b.id left join wms_item c on b.item_id=c.id where a.receipt_order_id=#{receiptOrderId} and a.del_flag=0
